LanguageData.YokaiSodathi.degreeDatas.0.label: Yokai Child
LanguageData.YokaiSodathi.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up amongst the Yokai; the Tsuzurao itself, perhaps, deigned to take notice, and blessed [PAWN_nameDef] with greater agility and animal handling, though they suffer higher sensitivity to toxins and psychic attacks in exchange.
LanguageData.HanYou.degreeDatas.0.label: Nurarihyon's Blood
LanguageData.HanYou.degreeDatas.0.description: An ancestor of [PAWN_nameDef] married a Nurarihyon. Spectral blood fills their veins, granting them increased physical ability.
LanguageData.YokaiWarrior.degreeDatas.0.label: 三尾
LanguageData.YokaiWarrior.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は妖怪武術を学び達人と呼ばれる域に達しています。
LanguageData.YokaiWarrior.degreeDatas.1.label: 五尾
LanguageData.YokaiWarrior.degreeDatas.1.description: 達人たちの中でも飛び抜けた技術を身に着けた[PAWN_nameDef]は５つの尾を持つものと呼ばれています。
LanguageData.YokaiWarrior.degreeDatas.2.label: 白尾
LanguageData.YokaiWarrior.degreeDatas.2.description: 生まれ持った天賦の才を極限まで磨き上げた者にのみ「白尾」の称号が与えられます。
